DOC.HEADLINE: NO RADIOACTIVITY FOUND IN FRENCH REACTOR BLAST
DOC.TEXT: French authorities said Friday they had found no radioactive contamination from an explosion at a disused nuclear_reactor in southern France Thursday . The blast , in an experimental fast-breeder reactor being dismantled at Cadarache , killed one worker and injured four . Authorities did not evacuate the area around the sprawling nuclear complex , at Cadarache , 45 miles northwest of Marseilles . The reactor was halted 11 years ago .
